page.title: 12Traffic Census A 605..
page.content: The A 605 goes through Ringstead and is a busy traffic route.One way is to Raunds and then to Stanwick, Rushden, Wellingborough and eventually Northampton.The other way is to Thrapston from where traffic can go to Huntingdon,Kettering,Oundle and Peterborough or Corby.A new road is being built called the A 45 which will by-pass Ringstead and take all the heavy traffic.Ringstead will be a lot quieter as a result.We are also very near the proposed A1-M1 link road.This is still being planned,but will by-pass Thrapston and the A 45 will link to it. When these are built Ringstead will be a nicer place to live in and the people living here will be able to travel more quickly to other towns for work and shopping,and to motorways so perhaps more people will want to live here.
